attributes.action: Cancel All online lessons until students go back to school on March 8th
attributes.additional_details: It’s not necessary to do online lessons because of the new scheme to help students catch up in the summer, this scheme is presumably been put in to help students catch up whilst they’ve been out of face to face learning but if online lesson is needed for students today then surely there is no need to do catch up in the summer.
attributes.background: Cancel the requirement of online lessons until students return to school (March 8th)

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566793
